result.execSummary:
All charges against David Lopez in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. David Lopez is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. David Lopez

records.addlTxt: Affidavit and order for payment of attorney fees and costs due from Milwaukee County signed.  Filed by:    DOUGLAS J REBHOLZ  $560.00

Defendant David Lopez in court.  Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz in court for David Lopez.  Prosecuting attorney Michael J. Odden in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a Jury Trial.  State's witness is not available and the State is unable to proceed. Defense moves to dismiss the case. Court ordered case dismissed.

Defendant David Lopez appeared by video.  Attorney Douglas J. Rebholz appeared by video for David Lopez.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Final pre-trial held. Case remains in trial posture. Case remains calendared for a jury trial on 10/19/2022 at 8:30 am in Branch 10.

Defendant David Lopez in court with attorney Douglas J. Rebholz.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
  Defense is requesting final pretrial and jury trial dates. Case is adjourned to 9-16-22 at 8:30 am for final pretrial and 10-19-22 at 8:30 am for jury trial.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff's Department 5/12/22

Defendant David Lopez in court.  Tristan J. Bednarek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.  
Matter scheduled for Pretrial Conference.  Defendant appears in Court without counsel.  Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation. Defendant requests court appointed counsel at the county rate. Court appoints Attorney Rebholz who shall be paid at the rate of $100.00 per hour. Court orders defendant to repay the County at a rate of $100.00/month beginning upon completion of the case and every month thereafter until paid in full.  Case adjourned for status conference in Branch 10.  Status conference scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant previously posted $150 cash bail. Court orders $150 cash bail returned to the remitter. 
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with MB.

No Contact Order, filed.

Defendant David Lopez in court.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 10.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for David Lopez
Current: 3476 S 14th St, Milwaukee, WI 53215 United States  (Effective: 06-06-2022)
Prior: 2807 West Burnham Street, Milwaukee, WI 53215
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 06/06/2022@2:30p
